item.title: Regular expressions that you can learn easily with Python
item.description: Although there are some cases where regular expressions are usually needed, I have not studied it systematically, so I will organize and summarize it. The language is Python. It’s quite long. If you read this, you shouldn’t get angry even if you tweet “I fully understand Python regular expressions”. What is a regular expression in the first place? Regular Expression is in English. This is an expression (processing) that performs various processing by specifying a specific pattern when performing special operations related to character strings.

item.title: [Regular expression] Advanced string replacement using re.sub
item.description: # table of contents Conclusion What is re.sub When to use Pass character string to replacement target repl -Commentary What is Advanced Replacement -Pass function to replacement target repl -Pass function with two or more arguments to replacement target repl -Advanced string replacement example -[Supplement] Advanced string replacement without using re.sub #Conclusion You can pass a function to the repl replacement target repl You can pass a function with two or more arguments to the replacement target repl of re.
